titles: A looking-glasse for all lordly prelates Wherein they may cleerely behold the true divine originall and laudable pedigree, whence they are descended; together with their holy lives and actions laid open in a double parallel, the first, betweene the Divell; the second, betweene the Iewish high-priests, and lordly prelates; and by their double dissimilitude from Christ, and his Apostles.
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
notes: Place of publication conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Episcopacy --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
